remarks: Set of objects of the category of rings (in a universe).  (Contributed by AV, 13-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringcbasOLD.c $e |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) $.
ringcbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringcbasOLD $p |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Ring ) ) $.
